snippet: The Australian iron ore miner and steel maker Arrium described the takeover approach from a consortium led by the Noble Group and the South Korean steel maker Posco as opportunistic, dismissing it as undervaluing the company.
abstract: The Australian iron ore miner and steel maker Arrium described the takeover approach from a consortium led by the Noble Group and the South Korean steel maker Posco as opportunistic, dismissing it as undervaluing the company.

headline.main: Australian Miner Arrium Rejects $1 Billion Bid by Noble Group and Posco
